game.name: Touhou Unite Arena
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: "Touhou Unite Arena" is a card Roguelike game based on the theme of the Touhou Project. Build your own team, combine the spell cards in your hand, play explosive attack values, defeat the target enemy step by step, and challenge the final champion!
game.shortDescriptionEn: "Touhou Unite Arena" is a card Roguelike game based on the theme of the Touhou Project. Build your own team, combine the spell cards in your hand, play explosive attack values, defeat the target enemy step by step, and challenge the final champion!
